post.author: rajitha_kba
post.title: Debug Visualizers
post.content:
This was introduced in VS2005.  It is a great feature, which demonstrates the extensibility of the IDE features. You can create your own Debug Visualizers as well.

I found something quite useful for Regex. Below is a link to the Regex Debug Visualizers. Just follow the instruction and you can get it up and running in no time.
